019
020import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Datable;
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Dialect;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.SQLEngine;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageConnector;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageManager;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.connect.SQLConnector;
026import org.intellij.lang.annotations.Language;
027
028import java.sql.ResultSet;
029import java.sql.SQLException;
030import java.util.HashMap;
031import java.util.Map;
032
033/**
034 * StandardSQL
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 0.1.2.0
038 */
039public abstract class StandardSQL implements SQLEngine {
040
041  protected final Map<Class<?>, Datable<?>> datables = new HashMap<>();
042
043  protected final Dialect dialect;
044  protected final String prefix;
045
046  public StandardSQL(final Dialect dialect) {
047
048    this(StorageManager.instance().settings().prefix(), dialect);
049  }
050
051  public StandardSQL(final String prefix, final Dialect dialect) {
052
053    this.dialect = dialect;
054    this.prefix = prefix;
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Called after the connection is initialized, so we can do any actions that need done immediately
059   * after connecting.
060   */
061  @Override
062  public void initialize(final StorageConnector<?> connector) {
063
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * The dialiect for this engine. This will be used for query purposes.
068   *
069   * @return The dialect for the engine.
070   */
071  @Override
072  public Dialect dialect() {
073
074    return dialect;
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Used to reset all data for this engine.
079   *
080   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
081   */
082  @Override
083  public void reset(final StorageConnector<?> connector) {
084
085    @Language("SQL") final String truncateAll = "SELECT concat('TRUNCATE TABLE ',table_catalog,'.',table_schema,'.',table_name) AS query" +
086                                                "FROM information_schema.tables " +
087                                                "WHERE table_name LIKE '" + prefix + "%';";
088
089    if(connector instanceof SQLConnector) {
090
091      try(final ResultSet result = ((SQLConnector)connector).executeQuery(truncateAll, new Object[]{})) {
092
093        while(result.next()) {
094
095          ((SQLConnector)connector).executeUpdate(result.getString("query"), new Object[]{});
096        }
097      } catch(final SQLException e) {
098        e.printStackTrace();
099      }
100    }
101  }
102
103  /**
104   * Used to back up all data in the database for this engine.
105   *
106   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
107   */
108  @Override
109  public void backup(final StorageConnector<?> connector) {
110
111  }
112
113  /**
114   * Used to get the {@link Datable} classes for this engine.
115   *
116   * @return A map with the datables.
117   */
118  @Override
119  public Map<Class<?>, Datable<?>> datables() {
120
121    return datables;
122  }
123}
